div.p: The Hampden Charter School of Science is a top-ranking tuition-free college preparatory school founded in 2009. Our core values are respect, responsibility, resilience, and excellence. The mission of the HCSS is to provide a college preparatory-focused education to the youth of every race and ethnic group in Western Massachusetts in a safe, academically challenging, and caring educational environment.

Tarkan Topcuoglu, Ed.S.

","tablet":""}},"slug":"et_pb_testimonial"}

blockquote.p:
We are excited and look forward to continuing to
provide our students with a high-quality public education. Let’s make this year the best year ever, by working together for our students!

div.p: The Science and Technology Program at HCSS is a highly challenging four-year curriculum which provides college-level academic experiences in science, math, and technology.
The Science and Technology Program at HCSS is a highly challenging four-year curriculum which provides college-level academic experiences in science, math, and technology.

div.div: The vision of the HCSS is to increase the rate of college entry of the students with excellent learning opportunities that are exclusively designed for the college preparation in a technologically rich-environment. The vision of the HCSS is shaped around the needs of students in these districts. Our curriculum mainly focuses on college preparation, mathematics and science education as well as other major academic areas: arts, language, and social studies.Individualized attention, tutoring, university outreach programs, social projects, and various creative outlets such as lab projects, science fairs, debate contests, and trivia competitions provide an enthusiastic, dynamic learning environment as well as encourage all students to think independently and creatively.

div.div: The Hampden Charter School of Science is a top-ranking tuition-free college preparatory school founded in 2009. Our core values are respect, responsibility, resilience, and excellence. The mission of the HCSS is to provide a college preparatory-focused education to the youth of every race and ethnic group in Western Massachusetts in a safe, academically challenging, and caring educational environment.

Sofia

The diversity in this school is awesome I meet people from all different backgrounds.
Tyrone Muangi

Teacher and students have a special bond that allows for mentorship and development.
Isreal Gonzalez

My teachers are so nice and helpful and there are so many extracurriculars for me to be apart of.
Corey Blinn

We as students get exposed to so many different challenges and ideas that broaden our horizons.I feel like here I have so many opportunities to succeed.
Kaetlyn Mersinacavage

I like that we can start AP classes as early as the 9th Grade and there are so many different AP course offered.
Courtney Berthiaume

I love HCSS because I feel like this school is where future leaders are made through the foundations of success.
James Bell

Here at HCSS the diversity is amazing. I am able to become a global citizen through experience and exposure to different cultures, religions and points of view.
Sebastian Swan

I love the relationships that I am able to build with my teachers and peers.
Javon, 9th Grade

div.div: HCSS encourages each student to increase his knowledge of the arts and to gain an aesthetic appreciation for the world around him. By exposing students to a colorful array of visual and performing art opportunities.
At HCSS, students develop passion beyond the classroom. They succeed not just in a win, but in the effort, and step back on the field each day, ready to work again.

his is your second chance to apply for the 2020-21 school year at HCSS-East and/or HCSS-West.
